net.grinder.console.common
Interface ErrorHandler

All Known Implementing Classes:
ErrorDialogHandler, ErrorQueue
public interface ErrorHandler

Interface for things that can deal with reporting errors and exceptions.

Author:
Philip Aston

                     String title)
Method that handles exceptions.

Parameters:
throwable - The exception.
title - A title to use.

handleInformationMessage

void handleInformationMessage(String informationMessage)
Method that handles information messages. Information messages are lower priority than error messages. In general, error messages should interrupt the user (e.g. use a modal dialog), but information messages should just be logged.

Parameters:
informationMessage - The information message.
See Also:
handleErrorMessage(String)
